name: Watuaga
description: Started this study a while back. It’s a favourite of mine as it has a lightness which some if the other studies miss. It’s also unfinished which makes it look like a ghost. Yeah, that’s right. It’s a drawing of a ghost noodle. Hope you’re day is full of fruit and rest. Touch those toes. Ten deep breaths. Crack on...and stick around, yo! x
